FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: The bat has such clarity of hearing that simple sounds become symphonies.
Il pipistrello ha un udito così limpido che anche i suoni più semplici sono per lui vere sinfonie.
Die Fledermaus hat so einen reinen Hörsinn, dass einfache Geräusche zu Symphonien werden.
La chauve-souris a l’ouïe tellement fine que de simples sons deviennent des symphonies.
El murciélago tiene tal claridad auditiva que para él los sonidos simples son sinfonías.
コウモリの聴覚の鋭さは、単なる音を交響曲にする。
The bat has such clarity of hearing that simple sounds become symphonies.
Летучая мышь обладает таким четким слухом, что простые звуки становятся симфониями.
O morcego tem uma audição tão apurada que até os sons mais simples soam como uma sinfonia em seus ouvidos.

STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: if IsTransformed( Object() ) then ApplyTransformation( 1, 1, CARD_TYPE_CREATURE, CREATURE_TYPE_VAMPIRE ) end

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TRIGGER: return MTG():GetStep() == STEP_UPKEEP and EffectController():MyTurn() ~= 0 and (not IsTransformed(Object()))
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local player = EffectController() if player ~= nil and player:CanAfford("{2}{B}{B}") == 1 then player:BeginNewMultipleChoice() player:AddMultipleChoiceAnswer( "CARD_QUERY_OPTION_YES" ) player:AddMultipleChoiceAnswer( "CARD_QUERY_OPTION_NO" ) player:AskMultipleChoiceQuestion( "CARD_QUERY_MC_PAY_2BB" ) end
local player = EffectController() if player ~= nil and player:CanAfford("{2}{B}{B}") == 1 and Object():GetMultipleChoiceResult() == 0 then player:TapLand("{2}{B}{B}") Transform( Object() ) end
